name: Ludo Party: Dice Board Game
description:
Ludo is a tabletop dice board game. Score all your pucks to beat the opponents and win exciting rewards.

Ludo Party offers smoothest pvp dice gameplay with fascinating boards, dice and pucks. Are you up for a challenge?

Ludo is a variation of the Indian game Pachisi, but simpler! In some parts of the world it is known as Parchis, Parchisi, Sorry! Or Trouble!

Play on glorious arenas and clubs around the world and show off your style. Do you have what it takes to become the star Ludo player?

Features:
Multiplayer 2 player and 4 Player matches with real opponents.
Play with friends and family.
Offline practise mode.
Earn a variety of dice and pucks.
Smoothest and fastest gameplay.
Multiple arenas around the world.
Free victory chests on winning matches.
Weekly Leaderboards and Championships.
4 player Challenge, Master Mode, events and Season Pass coming soon.

How to play:
Roll the dice
Move the puck
Be the first to score

As easy as it gets! Gather friends to have top fun and play this great classic and super popular board game from when you were kids. Show off your talent as you improve your skill more and more and become a pro player!
